Text.val: ... convert file from UTF-8 to Spain BU encoding (in case of errors job tuned already to MSGW within GB324)
... set to 'Y' if move of file from temp to new directory is OK

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*), cast(sum(SFEX_ALLOWEDFINANCEC-SFEX_DISCOUNTAMOUNT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/SFEX where SFEX_SCFH_NO = :2 and SFEX_ALLOWEDFINANCEC>0 for fetch only
